sentences.sentence: Man has belittled the Truth by tainting it with his personal agendas.
sentences.translation: 人类通过以他个人的议程影响它而贬低了真理。

sentences.sentence: Tyrande Whisperwind: I sense a strange darkness tainting them. They have been transformed by a great evil!
sentences.translation: 泰兰德•风语者：我感觉到一种奇怪的黑暗力量污染了它们。它们已经被一种强大的邪恶力量改造。

sentences.sentence: A group of scientists now say pollution is tainting the molecular build-up that causes a flower to smell so sweet.
sentences.translation: 一组科学家称目前的污染正在改变分子构成，造成花儿闻起来是甜的。
